document_data.mainbody:
House Auvryndar was a powerful drow house of Ched Nasad.
House Auvryndar was located on the second level from the top of the city.
In 1370 DR, the drow vampire Shyntlara Auvryndar was matron mother of House Auvryndar. She sat on the Ruling Council of Ched Nasad and was in Lolths favor. She was able to create drow vampires only from drow that had failed the test of Lolth.
